segments.text: Hello ? This is Mike here . May I have a word with Grace ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She ’ s not at her desk at the moment . Is there any message I can give her ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Please tell her that tickets to Phantom of the Opera will be delivered in two days . My number is 6521684 0 , extension 236 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . I ’ ll let her know as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S2
